definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Would my take you hand, would you understand Just how I feel?
sentences.chinese: 我能牽起你的手感受我的內心嗎？

sentences.english: Does she always dress that badly?
sentences.chinese: 她總是穿得那麼邋遢的嗎？

sentences.english: What sequela is there after becoming gall-stone operation?
sentences.chinese: 做了膽結石手術後有什麼後遺症嗎？

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞掃描器能幫助我們修補漏洞嗎？

sentences.english: Mr. Black, I have just been married, therefore can I get a raise in my wages?
sentences.chinese: 布萊克先生，我剛剛結婚了，所以我能提薪嗎？

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音機能收聽到倫敦的電臺嗎？

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道這個世界上有一種叫做雙頭白化蛇的生物嗎？

sentences.english: Is the production line fully auto?
Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能開一張不可撤消的跟單信用證嗎？

sentences.english: Yes, it was about the car auxiliary power plants, am I right?
sentences.chinese: 當然，那是關於轎車輔助動力設備，是嗎？

sentences.english: And if war comes do such men as these shoulder the musket and go into the trenches?
sentences.chinese: 但一旦戰爭來臨，這類人會肩扛步槍進入戰壕嗎？

sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?
sentences.chinese: 胰島素類似物會改善我的糖尿病治療計劃嗎？

sentences.english: Should I go up to the rooftop?
Have Chesapeake and other natural-gas producers survived the worst of the crisis?
sentences.chinese: 切薩皮克以及其他的天然氣公司真的挺過來了嗎？

sentences.english: Are you willing to return, escorted by me?
sentences.chinese: 你願意回去嗎，由我來護送？

definition: suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
